title: Development and Utilization of Hypermedia-Enhanced Language Education Materials

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Targets working professionals to improve workplace language proficiency. Includes hyper-content creation and evaluation processes using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can design hypermedia content components (text, multimedia, interactive elements) to develop language learning materials
Learners can design content structures for self-directed learning based on Derek Rowntree and Borg & Gall models
Learners can improve materials through expert review (content, language, media, instructional design) and learner testing (individual/small group/large group)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
